title: Basic Switch Expression
description:
Write a program that asks for a month number (1-12) using `Scanner`.
Use a **Switch Expression** to determine the season and print it.

- 12, 1, 2 -> `Winter`
- 3, 4, 5 -> `Spring`
- 6, 7, 8 -> `Summer`
- 9, 10, 11 -> `Fall`
- Any other number -> `Unknown`
